topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d421d563687242a6120400#post_54d421d563687242a6120400
It's primarily resigned to video gaming, because it's one of the few areas that sjw/anti-gamergate/gamer+ have gained a foothold in mainstream mass media.  The reason why 24/7 news is coming so hard to try and kill it is because it's their foothold into geek culture.  The way sjw operate is that they occasionally poke different subcultures to see if they're receptive to their ideals and/or if they can gain a foothold in the subculture to try to take it over.  The reason why sjw have gained such a blanket negative response from geeks is that since gamergate has started they have declared culture war on pretty much all of geek culture from anime to furries to bronies to gamers to pretty much anything related to geek culture.  The reason why sjw are still trying to focus on games is because that is their foothold into geek culture; if they lose the foothold then they can't regain their foothold into gaming.

To use an analogy back in the 90's moral panic for those of you old enough to remember the majority of geek culture united against mainstream news to push them back.  It's also why sjw are getting 24/7 news on their side to try to start a fullblown culture war; the reason why they're failing is that they have forgotten that it's not the 1990's and that the main difference now is that geek culture is mainstream therefore they are declaring a culture war on the mainstream subculture of geeks.

Say what you want, but this is the reason why I'm one of those people that think geek subcultures should go mainstream because I remember the moral panic of the 90's and I knew outright that the groups responsible for that weren't just going to forever give up; no I knew eventually they would make a resurgence and regroup into a new movement to try to start another culture war.


To use an analogy:
Pro-gamergate is Pavlov's platoon and gamergate is the battle of Pavlov's house; 24/7 news is like the german soldiers.  The "moral guardians" are trying to take over all of geek culture, but "*YOU SHALL NOT PASS!*"

Yeah. That'll work...
